question: What is the penalty for nondisclosure of foreign income or assets under Black Money (Undisclosed Foreign Income and Assets) and Imposition of Tax Act, 2015?
option1: Equal to two times the amount of tax payable, in addition to tax payable at 30%.
option2: Equal to three times the amount of tax payable, in addition to tax payable at 30%.
option3: Equal to three times the amount of tax payable, in addition to tax payable at 20%.
option4: Equal to three times the amount of tax payable, in addition to tax payable at 10%.
answer: Equal to three times the amount of tax payable, in addition to tax payable at 30%.
explanation: The penalty for nondisclosure of foreign income or assets under Black Money (Undisclosed Foreign Income and Assets) and Imposition of Tax Act, 2015 is equal to three times the amount of tax payable, in addition to tax payable at 30%.
